mets:div.LABEL: Foundation plan, section A-B, detail drawings of chimney footings and pier footings : 1.

East elevation (front), section through wall ; dining room details -- section of sideboard, elevations of west side and north end : 5.
North elevation, section through wall ; details -- section showing living room (showing nook & mantel), hall and parlor, elevations of side of nook and stairs : 6.

Full scale detail of siding : No. 12,

1 1/2 inch details -- detail in sections with plans of screen porch, part plan 1/4" scale of screened porch showing where vent and water pipes are carried up : 16.
